1.Betulinic Acid (BA).roles: as anti-tumour, anti-viral, anti-inflammatory, and anti-diabetic effects

2.Friedelin.roles: inflammatory drug, non-narcotic, analgesic, antipyretic, plant metabolite, anti-insect action

4.Beta-sitosterol.roles: sterol methyltransferase inhibitor, anti-oxidant, plant metabolite, mouse metabolite, anti cholesteremic drug

5.Eugenin.roles: antioxidant, antiplatelet aggregation, immunosuppressive/immunomodulatory and anti-malarial activity

6.quercetin.roles: antibacterial agent, plant metabolite, a phytoestrogen, a protein kinase inhibitor, a chelator, an antineoplastic agent.

7.kaempferol..roles: antibacterial agent, a human urinary metabolite, a plant metabolite, human blood serum metabolite, and a geroprotector

8.Myricetin.roles: strong anti-oxidant, anticancer, antidiabetic, anti-platelet aggregation and anti-inflammatory

10.Bergenings.roles: antiviral, antifungal, antitussive, ant plasmodial, anti-inflammatory, antihepatotoxic, antiarrhythmic, antitumor, antidiabetic and wound healing properties

11.Ellagic acid.roles: antioxidant, a food additive, a plant metabolite. It is an investigational drug.
